thread.title: Real Madrid open transfer talks over Chelsea keeper Thibaut Courtois — but rule out Alvaro Morata swap
thread.title_full: Real Madrid open transfer talks over Chelsea keeper Thibaut Courtois — but rule out Alvaro Morata swap

author: irishmirror
title: Real Madrid open transfer talks over Chelsea keeper Thibaut Courtois — but rule out Alvaro Morata swap
text:
Real Madrid open transfer talks over Chelsea keeper Thibaut Courtois — but rule out Alvaro Morata swap The Spanish giants have set aside €30million to land the Belgian in the summer Share Former Atletico loan star Courtois is wanted back in Madrid by Real (Photo: REUTERS)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Real Madrid have opened talks about a summer move for Chelsea star Thibaut Courtois – but have ruled out a swap deal involving striker Alvaro Morata. 
The La Liga leaders have made keeper Courtois their number one target, despite current first-choice Keylor Navas helping the Bernabeu giants to a run of 40 matches without defeat that ended last weekend. 
Courtois’ current five-year deal at Stamford Bridge runs out in June 2019 – and so far he has failed to agree an extension. 
Real have set aside 30million Euros (£25.9m) to tempt the Belgium international — who spent three seasons on loan from Chelsea to Atletico Madrid — back to the Spanish capital, and preliminary talks are reportedly underway with the Courtois camp.
